mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order`(order_no, shop_id, member_id, member_phone, member_name, total_amount, total_send_scores, total_refund_amount, pay_way, create_user_id, create_time, status) VALUES(#{orderNo}, #{shopId}, #{memberId}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberName}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalSendScores}, #{totalRefundAmount}, #{payWay}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.shop_id, o.member_id, o.member_phone, o.member_name, o.total_amount, o.total_send_scores, o.total_refund_amount, o.out_trade_no, o.pay_way, o.create_user_id, o.create_time, o.modified_time, o.status, i.order_no AS item_order_no, i.goods_Id, i.goods_barcode, i.goods_name, i.sale_price, i.send_score_ratio, i.send_scores, i.quantity, i.total_amount AS item_total_amount, i.refund_quantity, i.refund_amount, i.refund_scores FROM `order` o, order_item i WHERE o.order_no = #{orderNo} AND o.order_no = i.order_no
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET pay_way = #{payWay}, modified_time = #{modifyTime} WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
UPDATE `order` SET status = #{updatedStatus}, out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo}, modified_time = #{modifyTime} WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} AND status = #{expectedStatus}
